original_text: A man with leprosy came to him and begged him on his knees, “If you are willing, you can make me clean.”
korean_text: 한 나병환자가 예수께 와서 꿇어 엎드려 간구하여 이르되 원하시면 저를 깨끗하게 하실 수 있나이다

sentences.original_text: A man with leprosy came to him
sentences.korean_translation: 나병에 걸린 한 사람이 그에게 왔다

sentences.original_text: and begged him on his knees
